ABOUT_US: Who we are and what we do
ABOUT_US1: MooD is an application that was born with the aim of helping companies to measure
ABOUT_US2: the satisfaction rate of their employees.
ABOUT_US3: We have made this app with great enthusiasm.
ABOUT_US4: Do not hesitate to contact us! we want to hear your opinions about the app.
ABOUT_US5: You can send us your doubts, suggestions from the 'Send suggestions' menu item
ABOUT_US6: and we promise that we will take them into account.
ABOUT_US7: If you want to help us, do not hesitate to comment with your contacts this application!
ABOUT_US8: Thank you so much for everything!!
